name: LyDevGUI
title: LyDevGUI - Lyoneel's entities GUI
author: Lyoneel
description: DISCLAIMER: This is for developers or enthusiast, this mod do not add any content to the game. This mod shows entities information ingame, i made this for learning proposes (LUA and Factorio API) and for my future mod development, if the game crashes please send my a email with factorio logs and tell me what item you was targeting, TY!
